plot: A look at the Boston Red Sox's 2003 season, from Spring Training to their meeting with the New York Yankees in the American League Championship Series, and the team's relationship with their fans.
title: Still We Believe: The Boston Red Sox Movie
plot_es: A look at the Boston Red Sox's 2003 season, from Spring Training to their meeting with the New York Yankees in the American League Championship Series, and the team's relationship with their fans.
original_name: Still We Believe: The Boston Red Sox Movie
